key_title: Key to the species of Epaltes

source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Asteraceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Jeanes, J.A. (1999). Asteraceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Capitula broadly hemispherical, 4–7 mm diam., solitary in leaf-axils; leaves with petiole-like base; plant a prostrate to ascending annual or perennial
Capitula globose to ovoid, 2–3 mm diam., in terminal panicles; leaves sessile; plant an erect perennial
